cause.description:
It is designed to assist individual athletes in their quest to raise money for better treatments and a cure for prostate cancer.
The website is http://www.athletesforacure.org/
1. To help raise money for prostate cancer treatments and to find a cure
2. 1 in 6 American men will develop prostate cancer.
3. More than 27,000 men will die from the disease this year.
cause.mission: Athletes for a Cure is a fundraising and awareness program of the Prostate Cancer Foundation
cause.name: Athletes for a Cure- Prostate Cancer Foundation
